JUnit itself can't help you there, as far as I know.

Did you check out cps=
uite?
http://johanneslink.net/projects/cpsuite.jsp

Otherwise you could use=
 ant or maven or alike. They can use file
patterns to find tests.
Eclipse c=
an run all tests in a package/directory, but has problems
with suites, such=
 that it executes the tests and the suites, executing
the tests at least tw=
ice.

Greetings,
   Malte
